revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TRENDnet |model=TPL-310AP |revision=V1.0R |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/31/2011 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=Powerline Access Point, access point |fcc_id=XU8TPL310AP |ic_id= |pwr_v=110-240 |pwr_amp=0.2 |pwr_conn=NEMA 1-15P |pwr_vac=true |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8196B |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand=Atheros |cpu2_model=INT6400A1G |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2=1 |fla2_brand=Eon |fla2_model=F80-75HCP |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M12L1281868A-6T |ram1_num= |ram2=16 |ram2_brand=EtronTech |ram2_model=EM639165TS-6G |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8192SE |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=HomePlug AV |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=TRENDnet310 |default_ssid_regex=^TRENDnet310$ |default_ip=192.168.10.100 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:14:D1 |oui_eth=00:14:D1 }} '''Wireless 200Mbps AV Powerline Access Point''' :[http://www.trendnet.com/products/proddetail.asp?prod=135_TPL-310AP&cat=65 Product page] :[http://www.trendnet.com/downloads/list_subcategory.asp?SUBTYPE_ID=1451 Downloads]
===Marked boards=== *The device has a seperate AC board for the ''HomePlug'' AV and Ethernet stuff with an :[[Atheros]] INT6400A1G, [[Intellon]] INT1400, ''EtronTech'' EM639165TS-6G (16MB RAM), :and ''Eon'' serial flash.
*"PE925PLA-02A2.PCB" is silkscreened on the power board. :"P/N: PCB-925PL02A2" is silkscreened on the ''HomePlug'' board. :A sticker on the ''HomePlug'' board reads "925PLA02A212" and "PFB00705(RoHS)". :"37NB-W231B0+4B0[ ]REV:B[ ]" is silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos. :This is a '''Netronix''' P/N.
MAC labels affixed to the FCC EUT indicate the device uses a 00:14:D1 OUI, :which is corroborated by '''WiGLE''' data.
Default settings are per '''TRENDnet''''s manual.
